definitions: The act of altering something from its original course, meaning, or state to a distortion or corruption of what it was meant to be.
The act of leading someone away from what is considered right, good, or proper; corrupting someone.
The act of misapplying or misinterpreting something, often with malicious intent.
examples: He was accused of perverting the course of justice.
The cult leader was perverting young minds.
They are perverting the true meaning of the law.
